title: Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Long-Sleeve Oxford Shirt
description: SLIM FIT: Slim fit fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.
COTTON OXFORD: Soft and durable 100% cotton oxford shirting.
EVERYDAY SHIRTING: With classic shirting details, the long-sleeve oxford provides a classic, versatile look for everyday use.
DETAILS: Features a button-down collar, adjustable button cuffs, back yoke with box, and rounded hem.
We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family.
